name: Nair Sensitive Hair Remover Wax Ready Strips, Face and Bikini Hair Removal Wax Strips, 40 Count
short_description: One (1) 40-count box of Nair Sensitive Hair Remover Wax Ready Strips, Face and Bikini Hair Removal Wax Strips with 40 hair remover wax strips and four post wax packets
Face and bikini area hair removal strips help remove stubborn hairs and reveal beautiful, hair-free skin
Wax strips require no warming or rubbing for mess-free application
Dermatologist tested, No dyes, no fragrances, Wax strips for bikini and facial hair removal are safe for all skin types and even removes short hair
Face and bikini hair remover wax strips give you smooth results that last up to four weeks
product_description: Keep your glow going with Nair Sensitive Hair Remover Wax Ready Strips for Face and Bikini, infused with chamomile extract and free from dyes and fragrances. These dermatologist-tested wax strips leave your skin soft and smooth as they effectively remove even stubborn hairs from the root. Perfect for areas like upper lip, chin, center brow, cheeks and bikini. Unveil your radiance with this face and bikini hair removal waxing kit that helps minimize hair regrowth with repeated use as directed and lasts up to 4 weeks (individual results may vary). No expertise, rubbing, or warming required to use these mess-free waxing strips. Simply peel to separate strip, press firmly onto the area, hold skin taut, pull quickly in the opposite direction of hair growth, and use the non-flushable post wipes to soothe skin and remove residue. Always patch test a small area 24 hours before use (see insert instructions). Award winning Nair has always been a trusted leader in hair removal. Everyone deserves to feel amazing in their own skin; worship yourself with Nair.

product_description: The Flamingo Women's Body Wax Kit, Pack of 2, contains supplies for at-home body hair removal, including body wax strips and post-wax cloths. These no-heat wax strips for legs, arms, and underarms are designed to be used at home. This wax hair removal kit is for women who want to remove body hair without leaving home. Our gel-wax formula removes even fine and short hairs, as short as 2 mm. The wax kits include Post-Wax Cloths infused with sweet almond oil to clean and calm your skin. Each wax kit for hair removal contains 20 large (10 double-sided), 8 medium (4 double-sided) leg wax strips, and 6 post-wax cloths, making this two-pack of waxing strips kits ideal for women looking to remove body hair. No heating is necessary; simply peel apart the wax strips and press onto skin according to the included directions. This leg waxing kit is a body hair waxing solution for women. The detailed illustrated instructions included with this wax kit for women help make the at-home waxing process simple to understand.

name: Athena Club Facial Wax Strips for Women, Gentle Hair Removal for Sensitive Skin, No Heat Required, Vegan Wax Strips with Post-Wax Wipes and Soothing Serum, 20 Strips
short_description: No Heat Required
Long-Lasting Results: Our vegan formula uses flexible strips to remove hair from the root resulting in 28 days of smooth skin. Easy On, Easy Off.
Vegan & Cruelty Free: Wax strips are vegan and made with a highly effective, plant-based wax blend.
Safe For Sensitive Skin and All Skin Types: Our gentle Wax Strips are designed for most skin types, including sensitive skin.

product_description: Meet your at-home smooth skin solution for the face and other smaller areas. Our gentle, non-irritating and mess-free wax strips are specifically designed to target the face and other smaller areas for effective, long-lasting results. The strips are vegan and made with a highly effective, plant-based wax blend. The kit also includes post-wax wipes to clean and smooth, and a hyaluronic acid serum to soothe. Step 1 - Slowly Separate Strips. Apply in the direction of hair growth and smooth with your hand to ensure it sticks. Step 2 - Relax and Wax. Quickly pull strip against hair growth for best results. The same strip can be reused 2-3 times. Step 3 - Long Lasting Results. Cleanse with a post wax wipe, and apply a thin layer of serum. Enjoy smooth skin for up to 28 days.

name: Billie Wax Kit - Body & Underarm - Easy & Convenient - No Heat - Made With Aloe & Avocado Oil - Vegan Soft-Gel - 36 wax strips - 6 post-wax serum wipes
short_description: 36 MEDIUM + LARGE STRIPS: The Billie Wax Kit for Body & Underarm comes with perfectly sized strips for waxing the more larger surface areas on your body. Easily and effortlessly remove unwanted hair on your legs, arms, tummy, or armpits!

EASY & LONG LASTING: Get up to 4 weeks of smoothness in seconds. This Kit is easy to use and great way to achieve a fuzz-free look anywhere on your body without any fuss. Use the included step-by-step instructions to get smooth results every time.

CONVENIENT & MESS-FREE DESIGN: Designed with extra-grippy strips and extra-long pull tabs for quick and easy hair removal. Plus, no rubbing or heating necessary—these wax strips are ready to go when you are!

ADDED NOURISHMENT: The wax strips are infused with avocado oil for an extra touch of gentle nourishment to help soften hair and skin while you wax. Plus, aloe vera helps give your skin extra-soothing protection. Our soft-gel wax formula is vegan, cruelty-free, paraben-free, sulfate-free.
DERMATOLOGIST APPROVED for all skin types, including sensitive skin.
product_description: Want long-lasting smoothness around your legs, arms, or pits? Go stubble-free for up to 4 weeks with the easy-by-design Billie Wax Kit for Body & Underarm. No need for heating, rubbing, or long prep time—these wax strips are ready when you are. It’s a great fuss-free, mess-free hair removal option for any unwanted hair around your legs, arms, tummy, pits, and more. Made with avocado oil for an extra touch of gentle nourishment to help soften hair and skin while you wax. Plus, aloe vera for extra-soothing protection. Designed with extra-grippy strips and extra-long pull tabs for quick and easy hair removal. Afterward, use the included soothing serum wipes to help calm skin and remove any post-wax residue. The included wax guide has step-by-step instructions and tips so you get smooooth results every time, whether you’re a first-time waxer or a long-time pro. Dermatologist-approved for all skin types, including sensitive skin. Prefer getting smoooooth with a razor? Try the award-winning Billie razor. 5-sharp blades. Built-in aloe shave soap. Super-smooth shave.
